document_data.name: Faerie pool
document_data.mainbody: The '''Faerie pools''' were small pools of water tainted with an odd mineral in the rocks, located across the [[Sword Lands]], [[Laerakond]].
document_data.Description:
The pools produced gases that cause an "air frost" (snowflakes) that, if inhaled, caused brief but vivid hallucinations. Sages believed those gases were product of a mineral infected with the [[Spellplague]]. People with strong will could control those hallucinations and a few ones knew how to use that gas to divine the future.

Common people believed the Faerie pools were [[portal]]s to the [[Feywild]], and that fickle [[fey]] produced the hallucinations, hence the name of the pools.
document_data.History: The Faerie pools began to appear in Laerakond after the Spellplague.
